Package com.github.dandelion.core.utils

Class Summary
ClassUtils Collection of utilities to ease working with reflection.
EnumUtils Collection of utilities to ease working with enumerations.
HtmlUtils Collection of utilities to ease working with HTML tags.
LibraryDetector Collection of utilities to ease detecting whether some libraries are available or not.
PropertiesUtils Collection of utilities to ease working with Properties.
ReaderInputStream InputStream implementation that reads a character stream from a Reader and transforms it to a byte stream using a specified charset encoding.
ResourceScanner Utility class used for searching for resources in the classpath.
ResourceUtils TODO
Sha1Utils Utility class used when dealing with SHA-1.
StringUtils Collection of utilities to ease working with String.
UrlUtils Collection of utilities to ease working with URLs.
UTF8Control Custom implementation of ResourceBundle.Control that reads properties file in UTF-8.
WriterOutputStream OutputStream implementation that transforms a byte stream to a character stream using a specified charset encoding and writes the resulting stream to a Writer.
